name: The Way Back to Home
description:
*********************This Project*******************

1. New UI system

2. New animation Homepage

3. 3 completely different levels, 3 ways to pass the level

4. Small tips at the beginning of the level

5. Restart button in the pause/lose menu.

6. little changed tilemap.

7. Changed the script a little that keys can only be used once.

*************When you play the WebGL version************

1. Clicked the “RUN GAME” button to luach the game . 

2. It is recommended that zoom your webpage to100% and click the bottom at right corner to play in full screen.

Hope you like it and have fun ^_^

Credit: Yijia KANG(YEAHey)
